Judul: The Ceramics of K K Broni
Abstrak: The article discusses artistic techniques, career, and works by Ghanaian artist K. K. Broni. Topics explored include the way his grandmother's pottery making skills inspired him to specialise in ceramic art, his educational and work background particularly at the Industrial Art Department of the University of Science and Technology in Ghana, and the notable designs and characteristics of his works such as the "Bread Forms" art series.
Sumber: Ceramics: Art & Perception. Mar-May2016, Issue 103, p98-101. 4p. 12 Color Photographs
